author: marioevz
content:
Another slight difference in behavior I just found is that ethJS can reject a payload that has an incorrect BlobGasUsed with `INVALID` even during syncing, which I think makes a lot of sense, geth and nethermind return `SYNCING`

I can add a check to accept either of the responses, or force requiring `INVALID` on this specific test case but would like to know the opinion of others <@543900561460822016> <@758579010027782144>

IMO the spec does explicitly require this on:

But the information is there because it has the transactions and the blobgasused does not depend on the parent
